subject: Sir / Madam,
body:
Sir / Madam,
Are you looking for loans from GBP10,000 Pounds to GBP100 million Pounds, then contact us now as we provide loans with very little interest rate yearly.
We provide the funding through our Excess long term fixed deposits and we offer interested companies and individuals who really need capital for their various businesses on Health, Education, Agriculture, Real Estate, Projects and Sponsorships.
We await your reply for more details on Email: 
collinsray807@gmail.com
Mr. Collins Ray
Fund Manager

subject: Re:   Sir / Madam,
body:
Dear Mr. Collins Ray,

Thank you for your offer. However, at the moment, I am not in need of any loans. I appreciate your consideration and will keep your contact information for future reference.

Best Regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Olive

subject: Re: Sir / Madam,
body: Thank you for letting me know.

subject: Re: Sir / Madam,
body:
Dear Marykate Purchia,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am very excited about this opportunity to live and work in the United States. 

Could you please provide more details on the next steps I need to take? Also, could you confirm if there are any restrictions on where I can live in the US once I have a green card?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Olive

subject: REPLY
body:
HELLO,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am very excited about this
opportunity to live and work in the United States.   YOU ARE WELCOME

Could you please provide more details on the next steps I need to take?
YOU NED TO FORWARD THE FOLLOWING:

1. A SCAN COPY OF YOUR INTERNATIONAL COPY, THE FIRST PAGE
2. A PASSPORT PHOTOGRAPH
3. A PROCESSING FEE OF $1,000

THESE WILL BE USED TO PROCESS YOUR GREEN CARD VISA AND AFTER THE VISA HAS
BEEN APPROVED, YOU WILL THEN PAY A VISA FEE OF $205 DOLLARS ONLY.

Also, could you confirm if there are any restrictions on where I can live
in the US once I have a green card?   ABSOLUTELY NO RESTRICTION AS FAR AS
USA IS CONCERNED

REACH ME FOR MORE INFORMATION

MARY KATE PURCHIA

subject: Re: Sir / Madam,
body:
You're welcome! If you have any other questions or need further information, feel free to ask.

Best wishes,
Olive
